name: osu!
subtitle: rhythm is just a *click* away!
description:
An AltStore and derivatives source for the rhythm game osu!.

Source made by apix and hosted at https://apikusu.github.io/altstore.

Updated daily every 6 hours from 00:30 UTC.

Banner/header:
- Artist: Ferineon (https://osu.ppy.sh/users/23930728)
- URL: https://assets.ppy.sh/user-contest-entries/16321/58bb2fdea2b748edf8bc72efc1b8a7a3dcee90b85405817ee99d7acf4800ac8d_opt.jpg

apps.name: osu!
apps.subtitle: A free-to-win rhythm game. Rhythm is just a *click* away!
apps.localizedDescription:
This is the future – and final – iteration of the osu! game client which marks the beginning of an open era!

Currently known by and released under the release codename "lazer". As in sharper than cutting-edge.

news.title: New Featured Artist: Aspect
news.caption: Aspect's music isn't what you'd expect to hear from a rhythm game, but sometimes that's what osu! needs.

news.title: Monthly Beatmapping Contest: July 2025
news.caption: You have excellent taste in beatmaps. Let's see if the rest of the world agrees.

news.title: 4 Digit World Cup 2025 Concludes
news.caption: Another iteration of the 4 Digit World Cup is behind us. Let's take a look at what happened this year.

news.title: osu!mania LN Tournament 4: Registrations now open!
news.caption: Join us in the 4th installment of the osu!mania Long Note Tournament series — a cutthroat competition where the spiciest of noodles and strongest of players await!

news.title: osu!taiko Mapping World Cup 2025: Registrations Open!
news.caption: Da-don! After a successful launch last year the osu!taiko Mapping World Cup is back, bigger and better than before!

news.title: Featured Artist Track Updates: Summer 2025
news.caption: If looking at the editor only makes you confused, you have your whole summer vacation to learn how to create maps. With over 70 new tracks to choose from, the song for your first map might be here!

news.title: osu!catch World Cup 2025: Finals Recap
news.caption: This past week marked the conclusion of a long-fought battle for the podium, with Argentina, the United States, and Finland making it through. One final round remains to decide who will be crowned the osu!catch World Cup champions.

news.title: osu!mania 4K World Cup 2025: Registrations Now Open!
news.caption: Keysmashers, rejoice! The wait is over as the osu!mania 4K World Cup 2025 returns for its twelfth edition.
